com.xively

Interface XiSession


  • public interface XiSession
    This class provides access to Xively services, such as Xively Messaging, TimeSeries, Device Info etc. A session instance can be used after valid authentication while the credentials and tokens are living and valid. After logout it is expected that the session discarded and a new one is created on demand.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  XiSession.State
      The Session's state is Active when the authentication and the corresponding token is valid.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XiSession.State getState()
      Returns the state of this session instance.
      XiMessagingCreator requestMessaging()
      Returns a new MessagingCreator to provide an asynchronous creator for the IoT Messaging Service.
      void requestXiDeviceInfo(java.lang.String deviceId, XiDeviceInfoCallback callback)
      Query one Xively-enabled device.
      void requestXiDeviceInfoList(XiDeviceInfoListCallback callback)
      Query all Xively-enabled devices visible with the current end user credentials.
      void requestXiDeviceUpdate(java.lang.String deviceId, java.lang.String version, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> deviceData, XiDeviceUpdateCallback callback)
      Update device in blueprint.
      void requestXiEndUser(java.lang.String endUserId, XiEndUserCallback callback)
      Query user.
      void requestXiEndUserList(XiEndUserListCallback callback)
      Query user list.
      void requestXiEndUserUpdate(java.lang.String userId, java.lang.String version, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> userData, XiEndUserUpdateCallback callback)
      Update user in blueprint.
      void requestXiOrganization(java.lang.String organizationId, XiOrganizationCallback callback)
      Query one Xivelyorganization.
      void requestXiOrganizationList(XiOrganizationListCallback callback)
      Query all Xively organizations visible with the current end user credentials.
      XiTimeSeries timeSeries()
      Access your Xively data stored in TimeSeries.
